TASK: Craft an item of type: compass
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 36, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft a compass, I first need to craft four iron ingots. To do so, I need to smelt iron nuggets into iron ingots. The first step is to move an iron nugget from the inventory to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: After moving the first iron nugget, I need to move another one to the crafting grid. I will move it to slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1
